Name: Absolution
Description: While New Moon is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Special Attribute. If Sunny weather is in effect, this Pokémon will receive 1 damage at the end of the round.

Name: Adaptability
Description: Whenever this Pokémon uses a Damaging Move that matches its Type, add 1 Dice to the Damage pool of that attack.

Name: Aerilate
Description: Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Flying-Type, affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Dice of damage to Flying moves.

Name: Aftermath
Description: If this Pokémon faints due to a Non-Ranged Physical Attack , the user of that attack is dealt 2 Damage.

Name: Air Lock
Description: Negate all the effects of a Weather Condition in the field. If there are no weather conditions in the field, they cannot be activated by Moves or Abilities. If one is already active, it does not disappear but provides no effects.

Name: Amplifier
Description: All sound-based moves now receive 1 additional damage dice.

Name: Analytic
Description: If this Pokémon has a lower initiative than its target, Add 1 Dice to all of its Damage Pools.

Name: Ancient Presence
Description: The user's moves becomes typeless and will always hit regardless of abilities.

Name: Anger Point
Description: If a foe lands a Critical Hit on this Pokémon, increase 3 Points to its Strength Attribute.

Name: Anticipation
Description: If a foe knows a move that would deal Lethal or Super Effective damage against this Pokémon, it will alert its Trainer.

Name: Arena Trap
Description: Foe Pokémon on the ground become Blocked, they cannot escape or be switched out for as long as this Pokémon is in the field.

Name: Aroma Veil
Description:
User and Allies in range are immune to the effects of the moves:
Taunt, Torment Attract, Disable, Encore, and Heal Block.

Name: Athenian
Description: This Pokémon has a permanent increase of 1 point to its Special attribute.

Name: Aura Break
Description: Invert the effects that the Abilities Dark Aura and Fairy Aura have on their users. If said Abilities would increase a Dice Pool for their user, reduce it instead.

Name: Bad Dreams
Description: At the end of the Round, deal 1 Damage to anyone in the battlefield that has the Sleep Status Condition.

Name: Ball Fetch
Description: Whenever you throw a pokéball to a wild Pokémon, if the roll for catching it is unsuccessful, the pokéball will not break, this Pokémon will bring it back to you at the end of the scene instead.

Name: Battery
Description: Increase 1 point to the Special of all Ally Pokémon in Range. Ally Pokémon get 1 Bonus Dice to all their Special Move's Damage Pool.

Name: Battle Armor
Description: If a Foe lands a Critical Hit on this Pokémon, it will not get any Bonus Dice for it.

Name: Battle Bond
Description:
AFTER a foe is defeated by this Pokémon, if it has a Loyalty score of 5, change its Form into “Battle-Bond Form” (BBF) until the end of the scene or until it or its Trainer faints. Only one Pokémon per party may have this Ability. Pokémon with this Ability can't hold a Mega-Stone. 
- BBF increases by 2 the Limits of Strength and
 Special of the Pokémon.
- Redistribute Rank points on BBF as you see fit.
- Increase by 1 the Power of a Move of your choice.
- Restore its full HP & Will, and heal any Status
 Ailment upon changing forms.
- When in BBF, all combat damage inflicted on
 the Pokémon will also be dealt to its Trainer.

Name: Beast Boost
Description: If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Ultra-Beast, Increase 1 Point to its Attribute with highest limit. Up to 3 points can be increased this way. Only Ultra-Beasts might have this Ability. Beast Boost can't be swapped or copied.

Name: Berserk
Description: When this Pokémon's HP is half or less, Increase its Special Attribute by 1.

Name: Big Pecks
Description: This Pokémon cannot have its Defense reduced.

Name: Blaze
Description: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Fire-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Blaze Boost
Description: Immediately before using a Fire type move. Increase the user's Special, Special Defense and Dexterity by 1. Change Emolga to Blaze Boost form. In this form, whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, roll 1 Chance Dice to inflict Burn 1 on the foe.

Name: Bulletproof
Description: Reduce by 1 all damage from Special and Ranged Physical Attacks done to this Pokémon.

Name: Cheek Pouch
Description: This Pokémon restores 2 HP whenever it eats a berry with no HP healing effect. (e.g. Pecha Berry, Lum Berry)

Name: Chlorofury
Description: When Mega evolving or on switch in. Increase the user's Dexterity by 1 and its Special by X for 2 turns. X is the number of fainted teammates on this Pokemon's team.

Name: Chlorophyll
Description: If Sunny Weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Dexterity Attribute.

Name: Clear Body
Description: Other Pokémon cannot Increase or Decrease the Attributes of this Pokémon. This Pokémon can still Increase or Decrease its own Attributes.

Name: Cloud Nine
Description: Negate the effects of Weather Conditions on this Pokémon. This does not include: Harsh Sunlight, Typhoon and Strong Winds

Name: Color Change
Description: When this Pokémon is dealt damage it will temporarily change its type to match the type of the move that just hit it. The effect ends if the Pokémon is removed from battle.

Name: Comatose
Description: The Pokémon permanently has the “Sleep” Status Condition but it is immune to its effects. This Pokémon can't be inflicted other Status Condition. Moves and Abilities affecting Asleep Pokémon still have an effect on it.

Name: Competitive
Description: The first time this Pokémon gets an Attribute reduced by a foe during a battle, increase 2 Points to its Special.

Name: Compound Eyes
Description: This Pokémon gets 2 Bonus Dice on the Accuracy Pool of any move with Reduced Accuracy.

Name: Contrary
Description:
If anything would Decrease an Attribute of this Pokémon, Increase it instead.
If anything would Increase an Attribute of this Pokémon, Decrease it instead.

Name: Corrosion
Description: Ignore any immunity the foe has to Poison-Type Damage and/or to be inflicted Poison and Badly Poisoned Status Ailments.

Name: Cotton Down
Description: Is Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, reduce the speed of all Pokémon close to it. (Allies and foes alike at storyteller's discretion)

Name: Cursed Body
Description: Whenever this Pokémon is dealt damage with a Move, Roll 3 Chance Dice to disable that move. More than one Move may be disabled this way.

Name: Cute Charm
Description: If a foe hits this Pokémon with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, roll 3 Chance Dice to make the foe fall in Love

Name: Damp
Description: No ally or foe will be able to use the moves Explosion or Self-Destruct in an area around this Pokémon.

Name: Dancer
Description: Whenever a Pokémon uses a Move with the word “Dance” (i.e. Dragon Dance, Petal Dance etc.) This Pokémon gets a free action to use the same Move immediately after and succeeds automatically. (Damage must be rolled)

Name: Dark Aura
Description: Increase 2 dice to all Damage Pools of Dark-Type Moves of all Pokémon in the field. This effect does not stack. Pokémon and Trainers on the field will not cooperate with each other.

Name: Dauntless Shield
Description: Whenever this Pokémon enters battle, Increase 2 Points to its Defense. Outside of battle, this Pokémon is immune to physical damage.

Name: Dazzling
Description: Foes cannot use Priotity Moves against this Pokémon.

Name: Defeatist
Description: If this Pokémon is at half or less of its total HP, roll this Pokemon's Loyalty every action, if the roll fails Reduce 2 Points to its Strength and Special Attributes for that action. If it's successful it may keep its attributes unchaged.

Name: Defiant
Description: The first time this Pokémon has an Attribute reduced during a battle, Increase 2 Points to its Strength.

Name: Delta Stream
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Strong Wind Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate, The Pokémon with highest Will might keep the dominant weather)

Name: Desolate Land
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Harsh Sunlight Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate, The Pokémon with highest Will might keep the dominant weather)

Name: Disguise
Description: The first time this Pokémon would receive damage during a battle, reduce that damage to zero. Entry Hazards, Weather Conditions and Status Ailments do not trigger this Ability

Name: Download
Description: When this Pokémon comes out it will scan its foes and provide information about them. It will then Increase 1 Point to either Strength or Special Attribute at Storyteller's discretion

Name: Drizzle
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Rain Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)

Name: Drought
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Sunny Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)

Name: Dry Skin
Description: If Sunny Weather is in effect, this Pokémon will receive 1 damage at the end of each round. Fire attacks will deal 1 additional Damage to this Pokémon. Water attacks may heal 1 HP to this Pokémon instead of dealing damage.

Name: Early Bird
Description: The time this Pokémon would be asleep is reduced by half, it will only need to score 2 successes on its Insight roll to wake up in battle. This effect does not apply for the move “Rest”

Name: Effect Spore
Description: If hit by a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, the Pokémon rolls 3 Chance Dice to Poison, Paralize or Sleep the foe at random.

Name: Electric Surge
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Electric Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)

Name: Emergency Exit
Description: Whenever this Pokémon reaches half or less of its HP, it will switch out to its pokéball, sending an Ally to take its place. If there is no Ally, the battle may end. This Ability's effect is not affected by Block.

Name: Ethereal Shroud
Description: The user gains Ghost type associated immunities and resistances.

Name: Fairy Aura
Description: Increase 2 dice to all Damage Pools of Fairy-Type Moves of all Pokémon in the field. This effect does not stack. Pokémon and Trainers on the field will not attack the user of this Ability.

Name: Filter
Description: If a foe uses a move that would deal Super Effective Damage to this Pokémon, reduce by 1 the total Damage from that attack.

Name: Flame Body
Description: When hit by a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, this Pokémon rolls 3 Chance Dice to burn the foe.

Name: Flare Boost
Description: If this Pokémon gets any Burn condition, Increase 2 points to its Special attribute.

Name: Flash Fire
Description: The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Fire-Type move, add 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pool of Fire-type Moves this Pokémon uses until the end of the scene. Fire-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokémon.

Name: Flower Gift
Description: If Sunny weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to the Strength and Sp.Defense Attribute of the user and its allies

Name: Flower Veil
Description: User and allies can't have their Attributes reduced. User and allies can't have any Status Condition inflicted on them. Previously inflicted Attribute reductions and/or ailments remain.

Name: Fluffy
Description: Reduce by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokémon by All Physical Attacks. Incread by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokémon by Fire-Type Attacks.

Name: Forecast
Description: The Type of this Pokémon will change depending on the active weather. Fire under Sun, Water under Rain, Ice under Hail and Rock under Sand.

Name: Forewarn
Description: In battle, this Pokémon will warn about the strongest move one of its foes has. Storyteller has to reveal it to the trainer of this Pokémon in secret.

Name: Foundry
Description: Rock-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Fire-Type, affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Dice of damage to Fire moves.

Name: Friend Guard
Description: If this Pokémon is hit by a move performed by an ally, Reduce by 2 the damage dealt to it.

Name: Frisk
Description: When this Pokémon enters the battlefield, Storyteller must reveal its trainer the held item of one foe.

Name: Full Metal Body
Description: Other Pokémon cannot Decrease the Attributes of this Pokémon. This Pokémon can still Decrease its own Attributes.

Name: Fur Coat
Description: Reduce by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokémon by All Physical Attacks.

Name: Gale Wings
Description: Add +1 Priority to all Flying-Type Moves of this Pokémon.

Name: Galvanize
Description: Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Electric-Type, affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Extra Die of Damage to Electric Moves.

Name: Gluttony
Description: This Pokémon can eat any type of food, medicine or herbal medicine with no negative. This pokémon can eat any held berries at any point of the battle as a free action.

Name: Gooey
Description: The first time an opponent hits this Pokémon with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, reduce 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.

Name: Gorilla Tactics
Description: At the start of the fight, choose a Move. Increase 1 point to this Pokémon's Strength Attribute, it can only perform the chosen Move but it may Evade every Round. This effect resets if the Pokémon is recalled from battle.

Name: Grass Pelt
Description: If the effects of the move Grassy Terrain are active, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Defense Attribute.

Name: Grassy Surge
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Grassy Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)

Name: Gulp Missile
Description: If this Pokémon uses the Moves Surf or Dive, it will change forms after dealing damage. “Gulping Form” if it has more than half HP remaining, “Gorging Form” if it has half or less HP remaining. If the Pokémon is dealt damage by a foe when it is in any of this Forms, deal 2 Dice of Damage and an effect to it. Return this Pokémon to its regular form afterwards.

Name: Guts
Description: While affected by a Status Condition, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Strength Attribute.

Name: Harvest
Description: If this Pokémon uses a berry as a held item during a fight, the berry will grow back at the end of the day.

Name: Healer
Description: If an Ally on the battlefield has a Status Ailment, at the End of the Round this Pokémon rolls 3 Chance Dice to heal it.

Name: Heatproof
Description: Burn 1 deals no Damage to this Pokémon. If this Pokémon is hit by a Fire-Type Attack, Reduce the damage dealt by 2.

Name: Heavy Metal
Description: This Pokemon weighs twice as much as it's supposed to. Moves with damage based on weight get their damage pool modified accordingly.

Name: Heliophobia
Description: If Sunny Weather is in effect, this Pokémon will receive 1 damage at the end of each round. If New Moon is in effect, you may restore 1 HP to this Pokémon at the end of each Round.

Name: Honey Gather
Description: The Pokémon produces its own honey, you can get a small barrel of high quality honey every day. A small barrel of honey can be sold for up to $100. Honey attracts wild Pokémon and feeding a Pokémon with it will make it happy.

Name: Hubris
Description: If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Pokémon, Increase 1 Point to its Special Attribute. Up to 3 points can be increased this way.

Name: Huge Power
Description: This Pokémon has a permanent increase of 1 point to its Strength attribute.

Name: Hunger Switch
Description: At the End of the Round, switch this Pokémon's form. Only Morpeko may have this ability. This ability cannot be copied or switched.

Name: Hustle
Description: This Pokémon gets an extra -1 Reduced Accuracy and 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool for all its Physical Attacks.

Name: Hydration
Description: When Rain weather is in effect, this Pokémon will cure any status ailment it has at the end of the round.

Name: Hyper Cutter
Description: This Pokémon cannot have its Strength Attribute reduced by any means.

Name: Ice Body
Description:
If Hail Weather is in effect you may restore 1 HP to this Pokémon at the end of
the round. This Pokémon is immune to damage from Hail weather.

Name: Ice Cleats
Description: If Hail Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attibute of this Pokémon.

Name: Ice Face
Description: The Pokémon has 2 extra HP when it is on “Ice Face form”. If the Ice receives 2 damage, change the Pokémon's form to “No-Ice Form”. To restore “Ice Face Form” the Pokémon must be out one whole Round while Hail weather is active.

Name: Ice Scales
Description: Reduce by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokémon by All Special Attacks.

Name: Illuminate
Description: Increases the chance of random Wild Pokémon encounters. If there were enviromental challenges where there is reduced visibility, this Pokémon and it's allies are immune to the effects.

Name: Illusion
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it will have the form of another Pokémon in the party, it will regain its original form if it receives damage. When taking a human form it cannot speak and its tail may remain visible.

Name: Immunity
Description: Poison and Badly Poisoned Status deal no damage to this Pokémon.

Name: Imposter
Description: As soon as it enters to battle, this Pokémon will be under the effects of the move Transform.

Name: Infiltrator
Description:
Shield Moves, Safeguard, Substitute, Light Screen, and Reflect are ignored by
this Pokémon.

Name: Innards Out
Description: If an attack would faint this Pokémon, it inflicts damage on the foe equal to whatever remaining HP it had.

Name: Inner Focus
Description: This Pokémon does not Flinch and cannot be Intimidated. (Intimidate Ability does not have any effect against this Pokémon.)

Name: Insomnia
Description: This Pokémon is not affected by the Sleep Status.

Name: Intimidate
Description: When this Pokémon comes into battle, Reduce 1 Point to the Strength of all foes in range. This effect will last for as long as this Pokémon is out. Reduce random encounters with wild Pokémon.

Name: Intoxicate
Description: Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Poison-Type. Affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 extra Die of Damage to Poison Moves.

Name: Intrepid Sword
Description: Whenever this Pokémon enters battle, Increase 2 Points to its Strength. Outside of battle, this Pokémon can cut through any surface.

Name: Irrelephant
Description: Moves performed by this Pokemon ignores type based immunity.

Name: Iron Barbs
Description: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Non- Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 1 Die of Damage against the attacker.

Name: Iron Fist
Description: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Pool of Fist Based moves.

Name: Justified
Description: The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Dark-Type Attack or if it has witnessed something it considers unjust, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute.

Name: Keen Eye
Description: This Pokémon cannot have successes removed from its Accuracy rolls by Moves, Items or Abilities. Pain Penalizations and Difficulty Penalties may still apply.

Name: Klutz
Description: Held items won't have any effect on this Pokémon.

Name: Leaf Guard
Description: If Sunny weather is in effect, this Pokémon can't have any Status Conditions inflicted. Previously inflicted conditions remain.

Name: Lernean
Description: The Pokemon gains additional heads when it loses hp. One at 80%, 60%, 40% and 20%. Each head adds an additional 1 damage die to the Pokemon. Restoring HP does not remove the heads and they will only disappeaar when the user cancels the Mega Evolution.

Name: Levitate
Description: Ground-Type moves and effects on the ground won't affect this Pokémon. If a Pokémon uses a move that binds it to the ground the effects are lost until it is free again.

Name: Libero
Description: Whenever this Pokémon uses a move, first change its type to that of the move. If the move is an attack and deals damage, use the appropriate STAB.

Name: Light Metal
Description: This Pokemon weighs 50% less than it's supposed to. Moves with damage based on weight get their damage pool modified accordingly.

Name: Lightning Rod
Description: If anyone uses an Electric-Type move with a Single target, it will be redirected to this Pokémon; it is immune to damage from them. The first time this Pokémon is hit by an Electric-Type move, Increase 1 Point to this Pokemon's Special.

Name: Limber
Description: This Pokémon is not affected by the Paralysis Status.

Name: Liquid Ooze
Description: If hit by a move that would asborb this Pokemon's vital energy (Leech seed, Dream Eater, Drain Punch, etc.) it will instead deal that amount as damage.

Name: Liquid Voice
Description: All Sound-Based Moves this Pokémon uses are considered Water-Type.

Name: Long Reach
Description: All Attacks made by this Pokémon are considered Ranged attacks.

Name: Magic Bounce
Description: All Support moves that target this Pokémon or its side of the battlefield will have its effects redirected into the foe's instead.

Name: Magic Guard
Description: This Pokémon won't receive damage from Status Conditions, Recoil, Held Item or Weather Conditions

Name: Magician
Description: This Pokémon will steal the Held Item of a foe it just hit.

Name: Magma Armor
Description: This Pokémon is not affected by the Frozen Status.

Name: Magnet Pull
Description: All Steel-Type Pokémon on the field are Blocked.

Name: Marvel Scale
Description: If this Pokémon has a Status Ailment, Increase 2 points to its Defense Attribute.

Name: Mega Launcher
Description: Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool/Healing Pool of moves with the keyword “Pulse” and “Aura” on their name.

Name: Merciless
Description: If the Foe is inflicted with Poison or Badly Poison, all of this Pokémon Moves are considered to be Critical Hits. This Pokémon will not hold back when using Lethal Damage Moves at Storyteller's discretion.

Name: Mimicry
Description: If there is a Terrain Move active (i.e. Electric Terrain, Psyichic Terrain etc.) Change this Pokémon's main type to match the active Terrain. Restore its original main type if the terrain effects end.

Name: Minus
Description: If an ally Pokémon on the field has the ability “Plus”, Increase 2 Points to the Special Attribute of this Pokémon.

Name: Mirror Armor
Description: All Attribute-reducing effects that target this Pokémon or its side of the battlefield will have its effects redirected into the foe's instead.

Name: Misty Surge
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Misty Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)

Name: Mold Breaker
Description: If a foe Pokémon has a type, an immunity, or an Ability that would prevent this Pokémon from attacking with a certain Move, ignore it.

Name: Moody
Description: At the end of each round, reset Attributes modified by Moody, then Reduce 1 Point to a random Attribute and Increase 1 Point to another random Attribute.

Name: Motor Drive
Description: The first time this Pokémon is hit by an Electric-type move, Increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute. This Pokémon doesn't receive damage from Electrictype moves.

Name: Moxie
Description: If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Pokémon, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute. Up to 3 points can be increased this way.

Name: Multiscale
Description: If this Pokémon was at full health, Reduce by 1 the damage dealt by an attack.

Name: Multitype
Description: This Pokémon can freely change its Type at any moment. This Ability can't be copied, switched, changed, ignored, or negated in any way.

Name: Mummy
Description:
When this Pokémon hits or gets hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, the
foe's ability is changed to Mummy.

Name: Natural Cure
Description: At the end of the round, if this Pokémon has a Status Ailment, it Rolls 3 Chance Dice to heal itself.

Name: Neuroforce
Description: This Pokémon will deal 1 automatic Damage on any Move that is Super Effective against a foe.

Name: Neutralizing Gas
Description: Foe Pokémon in range will have their Abilities effects negated as long as this Pokémon is out.

Name: No Guard
Description: You can declare you won't make any Evasion Action at the start of the Round. If you do, roll all moves of this Pokémon as if they had no reduced accuracy.

Name: Noctem
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of New Moon. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)

Name: Normalize
Description: All the moves known by this Pokémon are considered Normal Type. Affecting STAB, weaknesses, immunities, and resistances. Add 1 Dice of Damage to all Normal Moves.

Name: Oblivious
Description: This Pokémon is not affected by the Love Status. It is immune to the effects of moves that affect its feelings such as Taunt, Charm, Captivate etc.

Name: Omnitype
Description: The user is considered all types when defending.

Name: Overcoat
Description: This Pokémon won't be damaged by weather conditions.

Name: Overgrow
Description: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Grass-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Own Tempo
Description: This Pokémon is not affected by the Confused Status.

Name: Parental Bond
Description:
All of the Damage Pools of this Pokémon get rolled twice. Choose the highest
roll to deal damage to the foe.

Name: Pastel Veil
Description: User and Allies in range are immune to Poison and Badly Poison. If the condition was inflicted before this Pokémon came out, it will remain.

Name: Pendulum
Description: Increases the damage pool of moves by 1 when used consecutively up to 3 times.

Name: Periodic Orbit
Description: Moves like Future Sight, Doom Desire and Wish will now activate twice. For example, Future Sight and Doom Desire will now activate once on the 2nd turn and then trigger again on the 4th turn. Wish will activate on the next round and a 2nd time on the 2nd round.

Name: Perish Body
Description: If this Pokémon is hit with Non-Ranged Physical Attack, the Foe will receive its remaining HP as damage and faint after three Rounds, unless it is removed from battle.

Name: Phototroph
Description: If Sunny weather is in effect, you may restore 1 HP to this Pokémon at the end of each Round. You can still restore 1 HP at the end of each round without Sunny weather but only 5 per day. This ability is disabled during New Moon and Rainy weather.

Name: Pickup
Description: If this Pokémon was out of its Pokéball, at the end of the scene see what it found for you at Storyteller's discretion.

Name: Pickpocket
Description: If this Pokémon is not holding an Item it will steal the held Item of the foe it just hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack.

Name: Pixilate
Description: Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Fairy-Type. Affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 extra Die of Damage to Fairy Moves.

Name: Plus
Description: If an ally Pokémon has the ability “Minus”, Increase 2 Points to the Special Attribute of this Pokémon.

Name: Poison Heal
Description: If this Pokémon becomes poisoned or badly poisoned. It will Heal 1 HP at the end of each round instead of receiving damage. The Poison will be completely absorbed after 3 Rounds.

Name: Poison Point
Description: If this Pokémon is hit by a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the foe.

Name: Poison Touch
Description: If this Pokémon hits its foe with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 2 Chance Dice to Poison the foe.

Name: Power Construct
Description: At the end of the Round, if this Pokémon has half or less of its HP, change its Form to the next one. When this Pokémon changes Form, remove Status Ailments & restore its full HP & Will. This Ability can't be copied, switched, or changed.

Name: Power of Alchemy
Description: For the next 24 Hours the Pokémon copies the ability of a fainted foe. Multiple Abilities may be copied this way, but only one may be active during combat. (Certain Abilities cannot be copied at Storyteller's Discretion)

Name: Power Spot
Description: Increase 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pools from Moves of One Ally. This Effect does not stack on the same Ally if multiple Pokémon use this Ability.

Name: Prankster
Description: Add Pritority +1 to all Support moves of this Pokémon.

Name: Pressure
Description: While this Pokémon is out, reduce the total Will Points of all foes by half, rounded down.

Name: Primordial Sea
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Typhoon Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate, The Pokémon with highest Will might keep the dominant weather)

Name: Prism Armor
Description: Negate all automatic Damage from any Super Effective Move dealt to this Pokémon.

Name: Prism Guard
Description: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a non-contact Attack, Roll 1 Die of damage against the attacker.

Name: Propeller Tail
Description: Ignore any Moves or Abilities that would redirect this Pokémon's Moves into another target. (i.e. The Move “Follow Me”, the Ability “Lightining Rod” etc.)

Name: Protean
Description: Whenever this Pokémon uses a move, first change its type to that of the move. If the move is an attack and deals damage, use the appropriate STAB.

Name: Protean Maxima
Description: Whenever Eevee uses a move that corresponds with its evolution. Switch its form to said Eeveelution. Eevee gains the type, stats as well as the abilities of said Eeveelution in addition to Protean Maxima.

Name: Psychic Surge
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Psychic Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)

Name: Psycho Call
Description: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Psychic-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Punk Rock
Description: Sound-Based Moves this Pokémon uses have 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool. Sound-Based Moves deal 2 less Damage to this Pokémon.

Name: Pure Power
Description: This Pokémon has a permanent increase of 1 point to its Strength attribute.

Name: Queenly Majesty
Description: Foes cannot use Priotity Moves against this Pokémon.

Name: Quick Feet
Description: While affected by any Status Condition, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Dexterity Attribute. The Pokémon may be inflicted with Paralysis condition but this Ability prevents its effects.

Name: Rain Dish
Description: If Rain weather is in effect, you may restore 1 HP to this Pokémon at the end of each Round.

Name: Rattled
Description: The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Bug, Dark, or Ghost-Type Attack, increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.

Name: Receiver
Description: If an Ally is fainted in battle, this Pokémon may copy their ability for the next 24 hours. Only one Ability may be copied this way. (Certain Abilities cannot be copied at Storyteller's Discretion)

Name: Reckless
Description: When this Pokémon performs a move with Recoil, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of that move.

Name: Refrigerate
Description: Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Ice-Type. Affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Die of Damage to Ice moves.

Name: Regenerator
Description: This Pokémon may Heal up to 4 Damage or up to 2 Lethal Damage on its own every day. The Pokémon must be out of combat to benefit from this effect.

Name: Regurgitation
Description: When Sand Tomb is active, everytime Delta Muk attacks, it will perform a second attack that has 2 damage rolls.. The typing is based on the primary type of the Pokemon caught in the Sand Tomb

Name: Ripen
Description: Moves that use berries for added effects will have 2 Extra Dice on their Damage Pool (i.e. “Natural Gift” etc.) Increase the Healing properties of Berries at Storyteller's discretion.

Name: Rivalry
Description: If this Pokémon has a foe of the same gender, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute. If the foe is the opposite gender, Reduce 1 Point to its Strength Attribute.

Name: RKS System
Description: Change the Pokemon's Type to match the Disc on its Held Item slot. (i.e. Electric Disc makes this Pokémon become an Electric Type)

Name: Rock Head
Description: This Pokémon will not receive damage from Recoil.

Name: Rough Skin
Description: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 1 Die of damage against the attacker.

Name: Run Away
Description:
This Pokémon cannot be Blocked. It may also obtain bonus dice to escape from battle or captivity at Storyteller's
discretion.

Name: Sand Force
Description: If Sandstorm Weather is in effect when this Pokémon deals damage using Ground, Steel or Rock-Type attacks, add 1 Extra Die to the damage pool of that attack. The Pokémon is immune to damage from Sandstorm Weather.

Name: Sand Rush
Description: If Sandstorm Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attibute of this Pokémon. The Pokémon is immune to damage from Sandstorm Weather.

Name: Sand Spit
Description: If this Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical attack, it starts the effects of Sandstorm Weather. The effect lasts 4 rounds.

Name: Sand Stream
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Sandstorm Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will, might keep the dominant weather)

Name: Sand Veil
Description: If Sandstorm Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Evasion of this Pokémon. The Pokémon is immune to damage from Sandstorm weather.

Name: Sap Sipper
Description: The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Grass-type attack, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute instead of dealing damage. Grass-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokémon.

Name: Schooling
Description: Only Wishiwashi can use this Ability. When this Pokémon reaches half or less of its HP its allies will arrive, when they do, replace your Pokémon for Wishiwashi School-Form at full HP. Increase its Rank to Pro. At the end of the battle restore Wishiwashi to its base form. (Healing/Fainting/Recalling prevents allies from arriving)

Name: Scrappy
Description: This Pokémon has the ability to hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal-type and Fighting-type moves, dealing Regular Damage. Apply the right resistances or weaknesses to the foe if it has a secondary type.

Name: Screen Cleaner
Description: When this Pokémon enters the field, remove any barries (i.e.Light Screen, Reflect etc.) on both the user and the foe's side of the field.

Name: Serene Grace
Description: Add 2 Extra Chance Dice to all effects done by this Pokémon. (e.g. A move has 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe, will roll 5 Dice with this Pokémon)

Name: Shadow Call
Description: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Dark-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Shadow Dance
Description: If New Moon is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attibute of this Pokémon.

Name: Shadow Shield
Description: If this Pokémon was at full health, Reduce by 2 the damage dealt by an attack. This effect cannot be ignored by Moves or Abilities.

Name: Shadow Tag
Description: All foes become Blocked. Ghost-type Pokémon are immune to this effect. Pokémon with the same ability are immune to this effect.

Name: Shed Skin
Description: At the end of the round. If this Pokémon has a Status Condition, it rolls 3 Chance Dice to heal itself.

Name: Sheer Force
Description: Whenever this Pokémon uses an attack with chance dice for an additional effect, you may ignore those chance dice and add 2 Dice to its damage pool.

Name: Shell Armor
Description: If a foe lands a Critical Hit on this Pokémon, it will not get its Bonus Damage Dice for that attack.

Name: Shield Dust
Description: If this Pokémon is hit by an attack with chance dice for an additional effect, it won't be affected by said effects.

Name: Shields Down
Description: Only Minior can use this Ability. After reaching half or less of its HP in battle, replace Minior by Minior (Core) at full HP. To restore it to its base form, the core must be set free and then recaptured after it returns a few days later.

Name: Simple
Description: If this Pokémon gets an Attribute reduced, reduce 1 more Point. If this Pokémon gets an Attribute increased, increase 1 more Point.

Name: Skill Link
Description: Add 2 Dice to the Accuracy roll of Successive Actions.

Name: Sleet
Description: If this Pokemon is in the field during Hail weather. All Pokemon that are not immune to Hail receive 2 damage rather than 1.

Name: Slow Start
Description: During the first 5 Rounds of a battle, this Pokémon will always go last in the initiative order. After those 5 Rounds are over, Increase 2 points to its Strength and Dexterity Attributes, and it will always go first in the initiative order. This effect resets if the Pokémon is called out of combat.

Name: Slush Rush
Description: If Hail Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attibute of this Pokémon. The Pokémon is immune to damage from Hail Weather.

Name: Sniper
Description: If this Pokémon lands a Critical Hit, it will get 3 Bonus Dice to the Damage Pool of its attack instead of the regular 2.

Name: Snow Cloak
Description: If Hail weather is in effect, Increase 1 Point to the Evasion of this Pokémon. The Pokémon is immune to damage from Hail weather.

Name: Snow Warning
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Hail Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)

Name: Solar Power
Description: While Sunny Weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Special Attribute. If Sunny weather is in effect, this Pokémon will receive 1 damage at the end of the round.

Name: Solid Rock
Description: If this Pokémon is hit by a move dealing Super-Effective Damage, reduce 1 Damage dealt to it.

Name: Soul Heart
Description: If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Pokémon, Increase 1 Point to its Special Attribute. Up to 3 points can be increased this way.

Name: Soundproof
Description: This Pokémon is immune to the damage and effects of all Sound-based moves.

Name: Spectral Jaws
Description: If this Pokémon uses a move with the Keywords: Fang, Bite or Crunch, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of that Move. These moves are all converted to Special.

Name: Speed Boost
Description: At the end of the Round, Increase 1 Point to this Pokémon's Dexterity Attribute. Up to 3 Points might be added this way.

Name: Speed Swap
Description: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Trick Room. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle.

Name: Spirit Call
Description: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Ghost-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Stakeout
Description: Whenever a Foe Pokémon switches out, this Pokémon will inflict 1 additional Damage with its first successful attack to its replacement.

Name: Stall
Description: This Pokémon always goes last in the the initiative order.

Name: Stalwart
Description: Ignore any Moves or Abilities that would redirect this Pokémon's Moves into another target. (i.e. The Move “Follow Me”, the Ability “Lightining Rod” etc.)

Name: Stamina
Description: The first time this Pokémon receives Damage in combat, increase 1 point to its Defense and Special Defense

Name: Stance Change
Description: Only Aegislash may use this Ability. At the beginning of the round, choose a Form. While in Sword Stance it can only use Attack moves. While in Shield Stance, it can only use Support Moves. Adjust its Attributes according to the Rank and Limits it has for each Form.

Name: Static
Description: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze its foe.

Name: Steadfast
Description: The first time this Pokémon is affected by Flinch, Increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.

Name: Steam Engine
Description: The first time this Pokémon is hit with a Fire or Water-Type Move. Increase 3 Points to its Dexterity Atribute.

Name: Steelworker
Description: Steel-Type Attacks used by this Pokémon get 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Steely Spirit
Description: Steel-Type Attacks used by this Pokémon and Allies get 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Stench
Description: Reduces the chance of random Wild Pokémon encounters. Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, it Rolls 1 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.

Name: Sticky Hold
Description: This Pokémon's Held Item cannot be removed, stolen or swapped by Moves or Abilities.

Name: Storm Drain
Description: If anyone uses a Water-Type move with a Single target, it will be redirected to this Pokémon; it is immune to damage from them. The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Water-Type move, Increase 1 Point to this Pokemon's Special.

Name: Strong Jaw
Description: If this Pokémon uses a move with the Keywords: Fang, Bite or Crunch, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of that Move.

Name: Sturdy
Description: The first time this Pokémon would faint due to a Damaging move, it will remain at 1 HP instead. Status Conditions and Self inflicted damage will still cause it to faint. The Pokémon must rest for an hour before benefiting from Sturdy again.

Name: Suction Cups
Description: The Pokémon is immune to effects that force switches.

Name: Supercell
Description: If New Moon and Rainy Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Special Attibute of this Pokémon.

Name: Super Luck
Description: Add “High Critical” to all the Attack Moves of this Pokémon. If a move already has the High Critical property, this Pokémon will only need 1 More Success on the Accuracy roll to land a Critical instead of 2.

Name: Surge Surfer
Description: If Electric Terrain is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Dexterity Attribute.

Name: Swarm
Description: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Bug-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Sweet Veil
Description: The Pokémon and its allies are immune to the Sleep status. Increase random encounters with Wild Pokémon.

Name: Swift Swim
Description: If Rain Weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Dexterity Attribute.

Name: Symbiosis
Description: If an ally loses or spends its Held Item, this Pokémon will immediately give the one it's holding to the ally as a free action.

Name: Synchronize
Description: If a foe inflicts a Status Condition to this Pokémon, the same condition is inflicted into the foe unless it is immune to the effect.

Name: Tangled Feet
Description: While this Pokémon is Confused, Add an extra -2 “Reduced Accuracy” to all the foe's Moves which target this Pokémon.

Name: Tangling Hair
Description: The first time a foe hits this Pokémon with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, reduce 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.

Name: Technician
Description: Add 1 dice to the Damage pool of all Moves with Power 2 or less.

Name: Telepathy
Description: This Pokémon won't receive damage from moves performed by its allies.

Name: Teravolt
Description: If a Move, Item or Ability would prevent this Pokémon from targeting a foe or inflicting an effect, ignore it. (e.g. A Pokémon with Immunity can be Poisoned, A Pokémon with Levitate can be hit by Ground moves).

Name: Thick Fat
Description: Reduce by 1 the damage taken from Fire and Ice-Type moves.

Name: Tinted Lens
Description: If a foe has a resistance against an attack performed by this Pokémon, make that attack deal Regular Damage instead. If the foe has a double resistance, make the attack as if the foe had only one.

Name: Torrent
Description: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Water-Type Moves, and they will get 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Tough Claws
Description: Whenever this Pokémon uses a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Add 1 Die to its damage pool.

Name: Toxic Boost
Description: If this Pokémon gets the Poison or Badly Poison Status, Increase 2 Point to its Strength Attribute.

Name: Trace
Description: This Pokémon copies the ability of one random foe when it comes out. Effect ends if this Pokémon is removed from the battle. Some Abilities (Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard etc.) Can't be copied.

Name: Triage
Description: Add Pritority +1 to all Support moves of this Pokémon that Heal HP or cure Status Ailments.

Name: Truant
Description: Roll this Pokemon's Loyalty every other turn, and score at least 2 successes. If the roll fails this Pokémon refuses to act. If it is successful it may act normally.

Name: Turboblaze
Description: If a Move, Item or Ability would prevent this Pokémon from targeting a foe or inflicting an effect, ignore it. (e.g. A Pokémon with Immunity can be Poisoned, A Pokémon with Levitate can be hit by Ground moves).

Name: Unaware
Description: This Pokémon ignores any of the opponent's Attribute increases or decreases. Both when attacking and taking damage.

Name: Unburden
Description: The first time this Pokémon loses or spends its held item and is no longer holding any, Increase 2 Points to its Dexterity Attribute.

Name: Unleafed
Description: When Mega evolving or on switch in. Increase the user's Strength, Defense, Special, Special Defense and Dexterity by 1. These boosts lasts for X + 1 turns where X is the number of fainted Pokemon in this Pokemon's team.

Name: Unnerve
Description: Opponents may not consume their held berry while this Pokémon is in the field.

Name: Vampiric
Description: When using a contact move, the user restores hp equal to a quarter of the damage dealt, rounded down.

Name: Vaporization
Description: All Water Type moves including Support moves will fail. Water Type Pokemon take 1 damage per round.

Name: Venomous
Description: The Pokemon will inflict Poison+ in place of regular Poison.

Name: Victory Star
Description: This Pokémon's and All its allies damaging moves gain “Never Miss” while this Pokémon is on the field. This Ability can't be switched or swapped.

Name: Vital Spirit
Description: The Pokémon is immune to the Sleep status.

Name: Volt Absorb
Description:
Whenever this Pokémon is hit by an Electric-Type Move, you may Heal 1 HP instead of receiving damage.
Electric-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokémon.

Name: Wandering Spirit
Description:
If this Pokémon hits a Foe with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, it switches its Ability
with the Foe's. Some Abilities (Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder
Guard etc.) can't be switched at Storyteller's discretion.

Name: Water Absorb
Description: Whenever this Pokémon is hit by a Water-Type Move, you may Heal 1 HP instead of receiving damage. Water-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokémon.

Name: Water Bubble
Description: Fire-Type Moves deal 1 less damage to this Pokémon. This Pokémon is immune to Burn 1 and Burn 2 Status. Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this Pokémon's Water-Type Moves.

Name: Water Compaction
Description: The fist time this Pokémon is hit by a Water-Type Move, Increase its Defense by 2 instead of receiving damage. Water-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokémon.

Name: Water Veil
Description: The Pokémon is immune to any of the Burn status.

Name: Weak Armor
Description: The first time this Pokémon is hit by any Physical Attack, Increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute and Reduce 1 Point to its Defense.

Name: White Smoke
Description: Foes cannot reduce the Attributes of this Pokémon. However, it can still lower its own Attributes.

Name: Wimp Out
Description: Whenever this Pokémon reaches half of its total HP, it will switch out to its pokéball, sending an Ally to take its place. If there is no Ally, the battle may end. This Ability's effect is not affected by Block.

Name: Wind Force
Description: The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Flying-Type move, add 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pool of Fire-type Moves this Pokémon uses until the end of the scene.

Name: Winter Joy
Description: During Winter, this Pokemon has its Strength and  Special increased by 2. However, it will have its Strength and Special decreased by 1 during Summer. Its stats remains unchanged in other seasons.

Name: Wonder Guard
Description: This Pokémon only receives damage from Status Conditions, and from Moves that deal Super Effective damage against it. This Pokémon is immune to damage from other sources like weather conditions and entry hazards.

Name: Wonder Skin
Description: Reduce up to 2 Chance Dice from foes against this Pokémon. (Example: The move Ember has 1 Chance Dice to Burn the foe, against this Pokémon it has zero Chance Dice).

Name: Zen Mode
Description: Only Darmanitan may use this Ability. When at half or less of its HP, change to Zen Mode Form at the end of the Round. Use its Zen Mode Form from then on. Adjust its Attributes according to the Rank and Limits it has for each Form.
